abstractive.text: Some of the key features and properties are: "Go-there", which is binary, and defined by the user, situation, ontology and discourse models; "timing" (current/next tour); "reason" (business, sight-seeing, socialising); "transport"; "length of tour"; "costs"; "entity" (open, accessible) etc.
